snippet: Lisa Gregorian of Warner Brothers Television Group has Comic-Con covered, from the picnic area that promotes her company’s cartoons to the hotel room key cards advertising the Warner drama “Person of Interest.:”

headline.main: Comic-Con: The Queen of the Convention
